put.description: Generate or update the API key for an account.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves the details of the currently authenticated user using the provided access token.

put.description: Update the role of an account and save associated role-specific details.
put.summary: Update account role and role-specific details

parameters.description: Payload containing role and role-specific details
parameters.name: payload

post.description: This endpoint authenticates the user by email, username, or phone number, and returns an access token and refresh token.

parameters.description: User credentials (identifier, password, and identifier_type (e.g: email, username, phone))
parameters.name: payload

post.description: This endpoint invalidates the refresh token, effectively logging the user out.

parameters.description: Logout payload containing the refresh token
parameters.name: payload

post.description: This endpoint generates a new pair of access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token.
This endpoint registers a new account and its associated role-specific details.
Maps a specified policy to an account by accountID.
post.summary: Assign a policy to an account

parameters.description: Account ID to assign the policy to
parameters.name: accountID

get.description: Fetches a list of IAM policies along with their associated permissions.

post.description: Adds a new IAM policy to the system. Only accessible to Admins.
Adds a new permission to an existing IAM policy.
post.summary: Assign a permission to a policy

200.description: Successful make a challenge with Email and OTP
Successful make a challenge with Phone and OTP

post.description: This webhook receives raw payload data when a user successfully uploads data.

get.description: Fetches a list of active validators. Optionally, a comma-separated list of validator IDs can be provided to filter the results.

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of validator IDs to filter results (e.g., 'id1,id2,id3')
parameters.name: validator_ids

resource.description: The resource this permission applies to

policy_id.description: Either PolicyID or PolicyName is required

policy_name.description: Either PolicyID or PolicyName is required

resource.description: The resource the permission applies to
